MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer is still ongoing. This is due to onsite difficulties carrying out the final repairs to our underground electricity network and we now expect power to be back on by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:22pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
